casebody.data:
August 15, 1978 In re Certified Questions from the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Michigan (WXYZ, Inc v 47th District Judge). (Docket No. 61048.) *955Kemp, Klein, Endelman & Ralls for plaintiffs. Keifer, Allen & Cavanagh for defendant.

Kavanagh, C.J., and Fitzgerald and Blair Moody, Jr., JJ., would grant the request.
